name: Armored Warfare – Dog of War Pack
name_original: Armored Warfare – Dog of War Pack
description:
Become a hardened mercenary with the Dog of War pack. Contains the following progression boosts:

- 3.000.000 Credits
- 4,500 Gold
- 60 days of Premium Time
- 15 Gold Loot Crates

A hardened mercenary has seen it all and keeps a large vehicle fleet at his disposal for any situation. This bundle contains the following Founder’s Pack-exclusive vehicles:

- Object 430 ICE Tier 3 Premium Main Battle Tank
- OF-40 ICE Tier 4 Premium Main Battle Tank
- M60A3 ICE Tier 5 Premium Main Battle Tank
- T-72AV ICE Tier 5 Premium Main Battle Tank
- Leopard 2AV ICE Tier 6 Premium Main Battle Tank

Last but not least, the pack contains four Founder’s Pack decals and a Founder’s Pack avatar

Please note:

- Premium vehicles provide a number of bonuses to their users, including better Matchmaking and improved progression rate
- Premium Time increases your account’s progression rate
- Gold is a premium Armored Warfare currency
- Loot Crates contain in-game boosts, Premium Time and other goodies

Dog of War pack owners will receive early access to Armored Warfare on PS4 – you will be able to start before anyone else. Do not miss this opportunity!

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.
